mobile-open-chat.title: Open the Chat
mobile-open-chat.description: Tap this button to open the chat interface where you can talk to Tiler about your schedule.

chat.title: Start with a Conversation
chat.description: Type what you need to do in plain English. Try: "Lunch with Sarah tomorrow at noon in downtown."

ai.title: AI Proposes a Schedule
ai.description: Tiler asks clarifying questions if needed, calculates travel time, and suggests when to schedule your task.

confirm.title: Review and Confirm
confirm.description: Check the proposed schedule. Click "Accept Changes" to add it to your calendar, or adjust as needed.

calendar.title: See Your Smart Schedule
calendar.description: Your task appears on the calendar with travel time included. Tiler adapts automatically when things change.

customPersonaModal.title: Create Your Custom Schedule
customPersonaModal.description: Tell us about yourself and what kind of schedule you need. We'll help you create a personalized schedule that fits your lifestyle.

placeholders.healthcare: I'm a healthcare professional working 12-hour shifts...
placeholders.student: I'm a student balancing classes, study time, and extracurriculars...
placeholders.engineer: I'm a software engineer who codes better in the evening...
placeholders.parent: I'm a parent juggling work, school drop-offs, and family time...
placeholders.freelancer: I'm a freelancer managing multiple clients and deadlines...
placeholders.fitness: I'm a fitness enthusiast who needs morning workout time...
placeholders.remote: I'm a remote worker across different time zones...
placeholders.business: I'm a small business owner with irregular working hours...

processing.title: Creating Your Schedule
processing.description: Please wait while we set everything up for you...
processing.optimizingDesc: Finding the best arrangement and saving your schedule...

banner.title: We Value Your Privacy
banner.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of analytics and tracking.

modal.title: Privacy Settings
modal.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Allow the website to remember your choices and provide enhanced features.

demoExplainer.title: See Tiler in Action
demoExplainer.subtitle: Try it now — no signup required. Choose a persona below to experience how Tiler turns natural conversation into a smart, adaptive schedule.

hero.title: Your AI-Powered Day Architect
hero.subtitle: Just describe what you need to do, and Tiler automatically builds a smart, location-aware schedule that adapts as life changes.

messages.userRequest: Lunch with Sarah tomorrow at noon in downtown
messages.aiResponse1: I'll schedule lunch with Sarah for tomorrow (Wednesday) at 12:00 PM downtown. You're currently at home. Should I add 25 minutes travel time?
messages.aiConfirm: Perfect! I've added the event with travel buffer included. ✓

messages.userRequest: I need to pick up groceries and go to the gym today
messages.aiResponse1: I can schedule those for you. What time works best? Your calendar is open from 4-7 PM.
messages.aiConfirm: Great! I'll schedule groceries at 5:00 PM (30 min), then gym at 6:00 PM (1 hour). Added! ✓

messages.userRequest: Schedule client meeting with John next Monday at 2 PM at his office
messages.aiResponse1: I'll add the client meeting with John for Monday at 2:00 PM at his office. That's a 35-minute drive from your current location. Should I block time before?
messages.aiConfirm: Done! Travel time and meeting added to your calendar. ✓

messages.userRequest: I have a dentist appointment at 9 AM tomorrow, then need to work from home
messages.aiResponse1: Got it! I'll add your dentist appointment at 9:00 AM (assuming 1 hour). Return travel home is 15 minutes. Should I schedule deep work after?
messages.userConfirm: Yes, block 3 hours for focused work
messages.aiConfirm: Perfect! Your morning is planned with travel time included. ✓

updates.title: Get the Latest Tiler News & Updates
updates.subtitle: Want to get more out of your schedule? Subscribe for tips, tricks, and updates delivered straight to your inbox.

integration.title: Integrate with your favorite
integration.subtitle: These apps are available to integrate seamlessly with Tiler.

featureHighlights.title: Feature Highlights
featureHighlights.subtitle: Simplify your life with Tiler, Here's what we can do to help you.

conversation.subtitle: JUST TALK TO IT
conversation.title: Natural-Language Scheduling
conversation.description: Tell Tiler what you need to do in plain English. The AI asks follow-up questions, proposes smart schedules, and waits for your confirmation—no drag-and-drop required.

transit.subtitle: OPTIMIZE YOUR DAY
transit.title: Smart Travel Time
transit.description: Tiler automatically inserts realistic travel durations between locations and adjusts your timeline when things change—so you're never late.

adaptive.subtitle: STAYS IN SYNC
adaptive.title: Adaptive Intelligence
adaptive.description: When life throws a curveball, Tiler reschedules conflicting tasks and finds the next best time—automatically.

location.subtitle: PRIVACY-FIRST
location.title: Location Awareness
location.description: Use generic labels like 'home' or 'work' instead of specific addresses. Tiler calculates travel time without oversharing your personal data.

whatIsTiler.question: What is Tiler, and how does it work?
whatIsTiler.answer: Tiler is not a calendar, it is an AI-powered scheduling app that not only manages your tasks but also optimizes your time. It creates smart, flexible schedules using AutoTiles that adjust as your day shifts, while also letting you lock in non-negotiable tasks using Blocks.

differentFromCalendar.question: How is Tiler different from Google Calendar or other calendar apps?
differentFromCalendar.answer: Unlike static calendars, Tiler is your AI scheduling assistant. Just tell it what you need to do in plain English—it asks clarifying questions, calculates travel time between locations, and proposes a complete schedule. When life changes, Tiler adapts your timeline automatically. You confirm changes before they're made, so you stay in control.

aiAccuracy.question: Can I trust the AI to schedule my tasks correctly?
aiAccuracy.answer: Tiler uses a confirmation-first approach—it proposes schedules and waits for your approval before making changes. The AI learns your patterns over time and gets smarter about durations, locations, and preferences. You can always undo or adjust any suggestion.

locationPrivacy.question: Is my location data private? How does Tiler use it?
locationPrivacy.answer: Tiler respects your privacy. You can use generic labels like 'home,' 'work,' or 'local cafe' instead of specific addresses. Location data is only used to calculate realistic travel times between tasks, ensuring your schedule accounts for real-world constraints. Your data is never shared or sold.

calendarIntegration.question: Why do I need to integrate my calendar?
calendarIntegration.answer: Integrating your calendar with Tiler lets you see all your tasks, events, and schedules in one place. No more juggling multiple apps or risking double bookings—Tiler automatically syncs everything and optimizes your day for maximum productivity.

multipleCalendars.question: Can I integrate multiple calendars to my Tiler account?
multipleCalendars.answer: Yes! You can integrate multiple calendars into your Tiler account. This way, all your events and tasks are in one place.

tileVsBlock.question: What's the difference between a Tile and a Block?
tileVsBlock.answer: Tiles are flexible tasks that Tiler automatically schedules and adjusts based on your availability. Blocks are fixed tasks that stay exactly where you set them—perfect for meetings or tasks that can't be moved.

tileShare.question: How does TileShare work?
tileShare.answer: TileShare lets you share tasks with others—friends, family, teammates—so everyone knows what needs to be done and who's handling it. Assign tasks, track progress, and sync schedules effortlessly.

missedTask.question: What if I miss a task or need to reschedule?
missedTask.answer: No worries! Tiler's Defer feature automatically finds the next best time to complete a missed task. You can also manually reschedule with a simple drag-and-drop.

habitTracking.question: Can Tiler help with habit tracking?
habitTracking.answer: Yes! You can use Tiler to schedule and track daily habits. Tiler auto-fits them into your schedule, so you stay consistent.

transitFeature.question: How can I use the Transit feature?
transitFeature.answer: The transit feature goes beyond just calculating travel time — it acts as your navigation assistant. It helps you plan routes, suggests the best modes of transportation, and provides real-time directions for seamless transitions between tasks and locations. Just tap the travel icon to get instant navigation, ensuring you're always on time and on track.

waitlist.subtitle: Stop managing your calendar, start talking to it. Get on the waitlist and be the first to vibe with time
